verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:18
verses.text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours: therefore acknowledge ye them that are such.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:19
verses.text: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:20
verses.text: All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:21
verses.text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:22
verses.text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maran-atha.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:23
verses.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
